text: Va kalidho [gancinaho]-i nihon nazdi Ust [va] cuz U [hec kas] onro namedonad va [Ust, ki] on ciro dar xuski va darjost medonad va hec ʙarge [az daraxt] nameaftad, magar in ki onro medonad va hec donae dar torikihoi zamin va hec taru xuske nest, magar in ki dar kitoʙi ravsan [Lavhi mahfuz] qaror dorad
